Articles.Content:
Long ago a space fairing race known as human lived on our buitiful planet kerbin. They were like lockust that would come to the planet take all of the reasorsies and then leave but the groupe of humans that setteld on kerbin were diffrent from most of the humans. They were scientists working on developing a new intelligent spiecies they worked fr years on a primmitive being know as the kerbals when they finaly gavve them the potental to be as smart and smarter than humans. The IEA( Interplanet Eforscement Agency) The new ecvilent to human police shut down the eperments for fear of this new race someday replacing them as the dominate race in the gaxicy. Only by dioing this they just puched thier reconing back a few thousand years.

A FEW THOUSAND YEARS LATER.

The kerbals had adansed the the human ecivlant of the 1960's they had begun landings on the Mun and theier second moon MInmus. and they were now getting ready to leave thier planet behind ang go off to anouther. Now they only wait for thier scientists to give them information on where thier new planets are. Soon they will be off and settling new planets. After that who knows where they will go.
